summary: This bill, the Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Physicist Pay Cap Relief Act, aims to codify the appointment, qualifications, and pay for therapeutic and diagnostic medical physicists within the Department of Veterans Affairs. It amends Title 38 of the United States Code to include these specialists, outlining training requirements, board certification stipulations, and pay adjustments. The bill also mandates a report to Congress on the effects of these changes, focusing on pay increases, care agreements, and associated costs.
